text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You're amazing, Trainer! 
I could never thank you enough!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I will take these stuffed animals that you 
have bestowed unto me and, with my whole 
entire heart, take them very seriously!
choice_data_list: You don't have to go that far…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But I must! 
I pledge to eat, sleep, and train with you, 
and keep you close to me at all times!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
After all, you are the precious children 
given to me by my Trainer!
